name: Panic Planting
description:
Weekly Game Jam Entry  - Week 166 Theme Roots

Panic Planting is My Second Completed Game Project, super proud to be honest learnt so much through the process. I didn't get as much game-play element/levels done as i wanted.

Hold Right-Click to pickup objects. Let Go of Right Click to Drop, Left Click While Holding to throw.

WASD and Mouse Controls

Drop Seeds in Garden Beds and wait for them to grow. Once grown pickup and throw or drop into the red truck to sell.

Would love some Feedback!

Planning to maybe add more levels and fix a few gameplay elements in the next few days.

Enjoy!!!! 

notes.

-----------Mouse sentivity was a last minute thing still is kinda funky. I found around 200 is pretty good.--------------

I made all the assets and sounds myself apart from the main music theme which was made using an AI music genarator.

The holding is a bit slow and objects you are picking up may get caught on corners. Just look up a bit and it should find its way.
